Class Credit

java.lang.Object
Account
Credit
public class Credit
extends Account
Credit Class is an child class that inherits information from the Account Class. With the information from the Account class it sets the accountType, currentBalance, and accountNumber for that specific Credit account.
Since:
March 15,2021

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int creditMax
    Stores credit max for credi account

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Credit()
    Default Constructor for the Credit Class
    Credit​(int accountTypeIn, double currentBalanceIn, int accountNumberIn, int creditMax)
    Makes an instance of the Credit class with accountType, currentBalance, and accountNumber declared

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean deposit​(double amountIn)
    Overridden Method of the Account Class deposit method that checks that the deposit does not bring the Credit accounts to anything equal to or above zero
    int getCreditMax()
    Gets credit max for a specified account
    void setCreditMax​(int creditMaxIn)
    Sets credit max for a specified account
    boolean transfer​(double amountOut, Account accountIn)
    Overridden Method of the Account Class transfer method that ensures that if the withdrawal from the current account does not go through the transfer fails otherwise it succeeds and deposits into the recipient account
    boolean withdraw​(double amountOut)
    Overriden Method of the Account Class withdraw method that ensures that once the withdrawal is complete it adds to the negative balance instead of subtracting from it

    balanceInquiry, balanceInquiry, getAccountNumber, getAccountType, getCurrentBalance, getStartingBalance, getTransactions, payment, setAccountNumber, setAccountType, setCurrentBalance, setStartingBalance, setTransactions

  • Constructor Details

    • Credit

      public Credit()
      Default Constructor for the Credit Class

    • Credit

      public Credit​(int accountTypeIn, double currentBalanceIn, int accountNumberIn, int creditMax)
      Makes an instance of the Credit class with accountType, currentBalance, and accountNumber declared
      Parameters:
      accountTypeIn - number related to specific account (1 = Checking, 2= Savings, 3 = Credit)
      currentBalanceIn - current balance posted for the credit account
      accountNumberIn - account number for specific credit account

  • Method Details

    • getCreditMax

      public int getCreditMax()
      Gets credit max for a specified account
      Returns:
      creditMax: credit max read off of CSV

    • setCreditMax

      public void setCreditMax​(int creditMaxIn)
      Sets credit max for a specified account
      Parameters:
      creditMaxIn - : credit max to be set for account

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit​(double amountIn)
      Overridden Method of the Account Class deposit method that checks that the deposit does not bring the Credit accounts to anything equal to or above zero
      Overrides:
      deposit in class Account
      Parameters:
      amountIn - the amount that is to be deposited
      Returns:
      true if the transaction is a success.
      false if the transaction is a failure

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw​(double amountOut)
      Overriden Method of the Account Class withdraw method that ensures that once the withdrawal is complete it adds to the negative balance instead of subtracting from it
      Overrides:
      withdraw in class Account
      Parameters:
      amountOut - amount that is to be withdrawn
      Returns:
      true if the transaction is a success.
      false if the transaction is a failure

    • transfer

      public boolean transfer​(double amountOut, Account accountIn)
      Overridden Method of the Account Class transfer method that ensures that if the withdrawal from the current account does not go through the transfer fails otherwise it succeeds and deposits into the recipient account
      Overrides:
      transfer in class Account
      Parameters:
      amountOut - amount that is to be transferred
      accountIn - the account that is going to get the funds transferred in
      Returns:
      true if the transaction is a success.
      false if the transaction is a failure
